alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Henderson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 5:55PM CDT until September 24 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Henderson County in central Texas... Northern Anderson County in central Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 555 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Coon Creek Lake, or 10 miles southeast of Athens, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Athens, Frankston, Berryville, Coon Creek Lake, Lake Palestine, Brushy Creek, Poynor, Bradford, Bois D`arc, Blackfoot, LaRue, Pert, Springfield, Todd City, and Neches. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
